title: Implement Mission Display on Marketplace
description: Add comprehensive mission visualization and tracking to the UBC marketplace, enabling swarms to view, track, and participate in missions across the ecosystem.
objective: Create an intuitive and informative mission display system that helps coordinate multi-swarm initiatives and track progress.

features.title: Mission Overview Page
features.description: Create main missions page showing all active ecosystem missions

features.title: Mission Detail View
features.description: Individual mission pages with full details, progress, and participation info

features.title: Progress Tracking
features.description: Real-time progress indicators and status updates for each mission

features.title: Swarm Integration
features.description: Show assigned swarms, responsibilities, and contribution tracking
